attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Foul Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned; if tails, it is now Confused.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pay Day
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charizard.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from Venonat equal to the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Meditate
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Lure
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Ninetales in order to use this attack.

ability.name: Energy Trans
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

ability.name: Energy Connect
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you make take one basic Energy cards attached to one of your Benched Pokemon and attach it to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Ampharos is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Lightning Strike
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy cards attached to Ampharos. If you do, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 40.

ability.name: Miraculous Powder
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Butterfree is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 2 damage counters from Butterfree.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Auto Fire
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Magby
text: If this Baby Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and your opponent tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else required in order to use that attack). If tails, your opponent's turn ends without an attack.

attacks.name: Energy Catch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put a basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Super Psywave
attacks.text: Choose one of you opponent's Pokemon. Count the number of Energy cards attached to that Pokemon. Put that many damage counters on the Pokemon.

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.text: If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach one of them to Raichu.

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.text: Discard all L Energy cards attached to Raichu or this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of them and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.text: Does damage to the Defending Pokemon equal to half the Defending Pokemon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charmeleon.

attacks.name: Sleeping Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokemon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent's next turn, Knock Out that Pokemon.

attacks.name: Stretch Kick
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, chose 1 of them and this attack does 30 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Ice Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Powder Snow
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Poison Seed
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Psymimic
ability.text: Once during your turn, instead of Alakazam's normal attack, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon's attack. Alakazam copies that attack including its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type that Pokemon is, Alakazam's type is still Psychic.) This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Syncroblast
attacks.text: If Alakazam and the Defending Pokemon don't have the same number of Energy cards on them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 80.

ability.name: Energy Connect
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you make take one basic Energy cards attached to one of your Benched Pokemon and attach it to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Ampharos is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Lightning Strike
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy cards attached to Ampharos. If you do, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 40.

ability.name: Jet Stream
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Blastoise is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to Blastoise, if any. Then, if there are any Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokemon, choose one of them and discard it. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

ability.name: Miraculous Powder
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Butterfree is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 2 damage counters from Butterfree.

ability.name: Burning Energy
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may turn all basic Energy attached to all of your Pokemon into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scorching Whirlwind
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If 1 of them is tails, discards 3 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If both of them are tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Charizard.

ability.name: Moonlight
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may put a card from your hand back on your deck. If you do so, search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Clefable is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Auto Fire
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Magnitude
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

ability.name: Rock Body
ability.text: All Damage done by attacks to Golem is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rock Tumble
attacks.text: Don't apply Resistance.

ability.name: Terraforming
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck and rearrange them as you like. This power can't be used if Machamp is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Iron Fist
attacks.text: Count the number of Pokemon you have in play with damage counters on them. Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of those Pokemon.

text: If this Baby Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and your opponent tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else required in order to use that attack). If tails, your opponent's turn ends without an attack.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

ability.name: Plunge

If your opponent has more total energy cards attached, you may search your deck for 1 Fire Energy card and attach it to one of your Benched Pokemon, if any. Shuffle your deck afterward. ability.name: Poison Pollen
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Vileplume is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon (1 if it has only 1).

attacks.name: Dogpile
attacks.text: Count the number for Pokemon on your Bench. This attack does 10 times that number to the Defending Pokemon, and Chansey does 10 times that number of damage to itself.

attacks.name: Energy Draw
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Electabuzz. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: If you have any Benched Pokemon and if there are any basic Energy cards attached to Electabuzz, take 1 of those Energy cards and attach it to 1 of those Pokemon.

attacks.name: Energy Recall
attacks.text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to Kadabra (1 if you have only 1).

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Giant Wave
attacks.text: Wartortle can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Tail Rap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Bone Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fury Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Lightning Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Psymimic
ability.text: Once during your turn, instead of Alakazam's normal attack, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon's attack. Alakazam copies that attack including its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type that Pokemon is, Alakazam's type is still Psychic.) This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Syncroblast
attacks.text: If Alakazam and the Defending Pokemon don't have the same number of Energy cards on them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 80.

attacks.name: Poison Spray
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Poison Reaction
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during you opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Supersonic Flight
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Claw
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

ability.name: Plunge
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if Poliwrath is on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, take all Energy cards attached to your Active Pokemon, if any, and attach them to Poliwrath. Then switch Poliwrath with your Active Pokemon.

attacks.name: Water Punch
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the amount of W Energy cards attached to Poliwrath. This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Steel Beak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Air Cutter
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Harvest Bounty
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), If you attach an Energy card from your hand to your Active Pokemon as part of your turn, you may attach an additional Energy card to that Pokemon at the same time. This power can't be used if Venusaur is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Foul Odor
attacks.text: Both the Defending Pokemon and Gloom are now Confused (after doing damage).

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunderpunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Arcanine in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: Arcanine does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Exeggcute.

attacks.name: Leek Slap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. Either way, you can't use this attack again as long as Farfetch'd stays in play (even putting Farfetch'd on the Bench won't let you use it again.)

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of defenders attacks. Defender cannot use that attack next turn.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times number of heads.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 damage for each Energy attached to Poliwag but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Energy after the end don't count.

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.text: If Spearow was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Spearow to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Recover

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Fearow.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

ability.name: Chaos Move
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), if your opponent has 3 or fewer Prizes, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 Pokemon (yours or your opponent's) to another (even if it would Knock Out the other Pokemon). This power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hide in Shadows
attacks.text: Switch Gengar with one of your Benched Pokemon.

attacks.name: Magnitude
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

ability.name: Heat Up
ability.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), You may count the total number of Energy cards attached to all of your Pokemon and all of your opponent's Pokemon. If your opponent has more total energy cards attached, you may search your deck for 1 Fire Energy card and attach it to one of your Benched Pokemon, if any. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Singe

attacks.name: Meditate
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

ability.name: Energy Burn

attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Withdraw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Squirtle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

ability.name: Damage Swap
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to use this attack. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Raichu.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Raichu does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Swords Dance
attacks.text: During your next turn, Scyther's Slash attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

ability.name: Energy Trans
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

ability.name: Buzzap
ability.text: At any time during your turn (before your attack) you may Knock Out Electrode and attach it to 1 of your other Pokemon. If you do, choose a type of Energy. Electrode is now an Energy card of that type (instead of a Pokemon) that provides 2 energy. This power can't be used if Electrode is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Electric Shock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Electrode does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Fetch
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Comet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.text: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from Butterfree equal to half the damage done to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance) (rounded up to the nearest 10).

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Kadabra in order use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Kadabra.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times number of damage counters on Magikarp.

attacks.name: Bonemerang
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Call for Friend
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fighting Basic Pokemon card and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

attacks.name: Pounce
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokemon attacks Persian during your opponent's next turn, any damage done by the attack is reduce by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (Benching either Pokemon ends this effect.)

attacks.name: Ram
attacks.text: Rhydon does 20 damage to itself. If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokemon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon. Switch the Pokemon even if Rhydon is knocked out.)

attacks.name: Sleeping Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokemon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent's next turn, Knock Out that Pokemon.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Magnemite does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Onix (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Spore
attacks.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
